sentence: En Georgia, por ejemplo, los partidarios de la Gran Mentira, la falsa afirmacin de que las elecciones de 2020 fueron robadas al expresidente Donald Trump, abuchearon al gobernador Brian Kemp, un republicano acrrimo que se enfrenta a un desafo en las primarias de un candidato elegido a dedo por el expresidente.
author: Por Frida Ghitis
title: OPININ | As podra verse la venganza de Putin contra Estados Unidos

author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: Brian Kemp headed to David Perdue's hometown, with David Perdue's cousin

sentence: Senator David Perdue is almost certain to lose to incumbent Brian Kempis among several contests into which Trump has injected himself this cycle.
title: Report: State Legislatures Have Become a Linchpin of Trumps Attack on Free and Fair Elections
